fullDescription.intro: This node encrypts pgp files with a given public keyfile and password
fullDescription.option: Enter a valid location where the to be encrypted file is located. The required syntax of a path depends on the chosen file system, such as "C:\path\to\file" (Local File System on Windows) or "/path/to/file" (Local File System on Linux/MacOS and Mountpoint).

Enter a valid location where the encrypted file should be written to. The required syntax of a path depends on the chosen file system, such as "C:\path\to\file" (Local File System on Windows) or "/path/to/file" (Local File System on Linux/MacOS and Mountpoint).

Enter a valid location where the pgp keyfile is located. The required syntax of a path depends on the chosen file system, such as "C:\path\to\file" (Local File System on Windows) or "/path/to/file" (Local File System on Linux/MacOS and Mountpoint).
